item.title: Golang Resources
item.description: I will add more resources. Please return to find something new! Study Resource golangr Golang Cheat Sheet Codecademy - go Books Head First Go (got my introduction with this) Thoughts on Head-first Go: This book was published before Generics was introduced in Go, so there’s no introduction to Generics. The author discussed unbuffered channels but gave a short introduction to buffered channels. Exercises golangr exercises exercism-go gophercises

item.title: Learning Git
item.description: SCM : Source Control Management. VCS: Version Control System. All of the content here is for command line, as I am very comfortable with terminal [and of course Linux]. Basic git syntax: program | action | destination. For example: git | add | . Configure git # set your name $ git config user.name "user-name" # set your email $ git config user.email "user-email@example.com" # set global user name $ git config --global user.
